typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ITemployees
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Payrollemplu
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		departmetn as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> HRemployees
ITemployees, Payrollemplu, HRemployees union(byName: true)~> UnionAllemployees
UnionAllemployees sink(input(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unionallemployees.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> employees
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		Depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Department
employees aggregate(groupBy(deptid),
	totalemployees = count(empid)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, Department join(Aggregate1@deptid == Depname,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		deptid = Aggregate1@deptid,
		totalemployees,
		deptid = Department@deptid,
		Depname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employeesdata
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		Depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Department
Employeesdata, Department exists(Employeesdata@deptid == Depname,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['harishoutout.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> harishoutout

source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		Depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Departments
Employees, Departments lookup(department == deptid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(input(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['lookupactivity11.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ouputdataset
